rows.label: tlk45350141_08_msg0001
rows.name:
You've built up the Hr√¶svelgr Mercenaries
so much at this point, I can scarcely
believe it myself.

rows.label: tlk45350141_08_msg0002
rows.name:
If Vandham were here to see it,
I daresay even he might shed a
tear or two.

rows.label: tlk45350141_08_msg0003
rows.name:
With all the Blades and members
you've assembled, we're a formidable
fighting force to say the least.

rows.label: tlk45350141_08_msg0004
rows.name:
You've got everything so well organized
that there's precious little for me to do
these days. Not that I'm complaining.
